H0.text: In 1968, which group recorded the L.P. ‘The Village Green Preservation Society’. The Beatles

H1.text: In 1968, which group recorded the L.P. ‘The Village Green Preservation Society’. The Rolling Stones

H2.text: In 1968, which group recorded the L.P. ‘The Village Green Preservation Society’. The Who

H3.text: In 1968, which group recorded the L.P. ‘The Village Green Preservation Society’. Kinks

A4.text: Village Green eventually morphed into their next album, The Kinks Are the Village Green Preservation Society, released in late 1968 in the UK.

A5.text: They have two albums, The Kinks Are the Village Green Preservation Society (No. 384) and Something Else by the Kinks (No. 478), on Rolling Stone magazine's 2020 500 Greatest Albums of All Time list.
